titleStmt.title: The honour due to the civil magistrate stated and urg'd in a sermon compos'd for the day of thanksgiving for the happy discovery of the late horrid and execrable conspiracy against His Majesties sacred person and government / by Theophilus Dorrington.
titleStmt.author: Dorrington, Theophilus, d. 1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
